doctor.name: Dr. Syed Abdul Kader
doctor.info: Dr. Syed Abdul Kader is a Endocrinologist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Endocrinology). He is a Assistant Professor, Endocrinology at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Syed Abdul Kader at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal is 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: 955 & 109, Shahid Nazrul Islam Road, Alekanda, Banglabazar, Barisal

doctor.name: Dr. Altaf Mahmud
doctor.degree: MBBS (Dhaka), MPH, CCD (BIRDEM), PGT (Skin, Sex & Medicine)
doctor.info: Dr. Altaf Mahmud is a Diabetes Specialist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS (Dhaka), MPH, CCD (BIRDEM), PGT (Skin, Sex & Medicine). He is a Consultant, Diabetes at Diabetic Hospital, Barisal. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Altaf Mahmud at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal is 4pm to 7pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: 955 & 109, Shahid Nazrul Islam Road, Alekanda, Banglabazar, Barisal
